# Load data and make TSNEPlots, DotPlots and Ridgeplots of data

```{r}
library(here)
source(here('30_tissue_supplement_figures', 'supplemental_figures.R'))
save_folder = here('30_tissue_supplement_figures', 'Liver', 'droplet')
dir.create(save_folder, recursive=TRUE)
method = "droplet"

tissue_of_interest = 'Liver'
filename = paste0('droplet_',tissue_of_interest, '_seurat_tiss.Robj')
load(here('00_data_ingest', '04_tissue_robj_generated', filename))

additional.group.bys = sort(c())

group.bys = c(standard.group.bys, additional.group.bys)

genes_to_check = c("Alb", "Apoa1", "Ass1", "Cd19", "Cd68", "Cd74", "Cd79a", "Cd79b", "Cdh1", "Clec4f", "Cxcr6", "Cyp2e1", "Cyp2f2", "Emr1", "Epcam", "Glul", "Gstp1", "Gulo", "Gzma", "Hal", "Hamp", "Il2rb", "Irf7", "Kdr", "Krt19", "Krt7", "Nkg7", "Nrp1", "Oat", "Oit3", "Pck1", "Pecam1", "Ptprc", "Serpina1c", "Ttr", "Ubb", "Zap70")
dot_tsne_ridge(tiss, genes_to_check, save_folder, prefix = prefix,
    group.bys = group.bys, method = method)
```

## Subset: HEPATOCYTES

```{r}
Hepatocytes.cells.use = rownames(tiss@meta.data)[tiss@meta.data$cell_ontology_class == "hepatocyte"]
write(paste("Number of cells in Hepatocytes subset:", length(Hepatocytes.cells.use)), stderr())
Hepatocytes.n.pcs = 8
Hepatocytes.res.use = 0.5
Hepatocytes.perplexity = 30
Hepatocytes.genes_to_check = c("A1bg", "Cyp2c69", "Cyp2d9", "Mup1", "Mup12", "Mup20", "Mup21", "Xist")
Hepatocytes.tiss = SubsetData(tiss, cells.use=Hepatocytes.cells.use, )
Hepatocytes.tiss <- Hepatocytes.tiss %>% ScaleData() %>% 
  FindVariableGenes(do.plot = TRUE, x.high.cutoff = Inf, y.cutoff = 0.5) %>%
  RunPCA(do.print = FALSE)
Hepatocytes.tiss <- Hepatocytes.tiss %>% FindClusters(reduction.type = "pca", dims.use = 1:Hepatocytes.n.pcs, 
    resolution = Hepatocytes.res.use, print.output = 0, save.SNN = TRUE) %>%
    RunTSNE(dims.use = 1:Hepatocytes.n.pcs, seed.use = 10, perplexity=Hepatocytes.perplexity)

# Append this subset's groupby to the list
group.bys = c(group.bys, "mouse.sex")
# Highlight which cells are in this subset
    
colors.use = c('LightGray', 'Coral')
tiss@meta.data[, "Hepatocytes"] = "(Not in subset)"
tiss@meta.data[Hepatocytes.cells.use, "Hepatocytes"] = "Hepatocytes" 
filename = make_filename(save_folder, prefix="Hepatocytes", 'highlighted', 
    'tsneplot_allcells')
p = TSNEPlot(
  object = tiss,
  do.return = TRUE,
  group.by = "Hepatocytes",
  no.axes = TRUE,
  pt.size = 1,
  no.legend = TRUE,
  colors.use = colors.use
)
ggsave(filename, width = 4, height = 4)
dot_tsne_ridge(Hepatocytes.tiss, Hepatocytes.genes_to_check,
    save_folder, prefix = "Hepatocytes", group.bys, "droplet")

```
